summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 9th Avenue Northeast, from south margin of East 53rd Street to East 55th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 90873 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
